duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead complex initiatives and projects to derive insights from extracted data to solve critical business questions
Translate client/stakeholder needs into technical analyses and solutions in collaboration with internal and external partners and present findings and outcomes to clients/stakeholders
Identify rich data sources and monitor the melding and cleaning of datasets to ensure consistency
Deliver high-quality project solutions and tools within agreed-upon timelines and budget parameters and conduct post-implementation reviews
Develop data-driven innovative analytical solutions and identify opportunities to support business and client needs in a quantitative manner and facilitate informed recommendations/decisions
Develop and create predictive models, behavioral segmentation frameworks, profitability analyses, ad hoc reporting, and data visualizations
Utilize ETL tools for data extraction, transformation, and loading

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Statistics, or related field (Master's preferred)
